devdoc.details: A contract that pays keeper fees using a Uniswap router.

approveToRouter(address,bool).details: Only the factory or the DAO can call this function.

params.approve: A boolean indicating whether to approve or revoke approval.

params._factory: The address of the ChromaticMarketFactory contract.
params._uniswapRouter: The address of the Uniswap router contract.
params._weth: The address of the WETH9 contract.

payKeeperFee(address,uint256,address).details: Only the Vault can call this function.

params.amountOut: The desired amount of output tokens.
params.keeperAddress: The address of the keeper to receive the fee.
params.tokenIn: The address of the token being swapped.

returns.amountIn: The actual amount of input tokens used for the swap.

params._uniswapRouter: The address of the Uniswap router contract.

devdoc.title: KeeperFeePayer

approveToRouter(address,bool).notice: Approves or revokes approval to the Uniswap router for a given token.

payKeeperFee(address,uint256,address).notice: Pays the keeper fee using Uniswap swaps.

setRouter(address).notice: Only the DAO can call this function.
